text: Andrea Rothfuss (born 20 October 1989 in Freudenstadt) is a skier from Germany. She has a disability: she was born without a left hand. She skied at the 2011 IPC Alpine Skiing World Championships. She was the first skier to finish in the standing women's downhill race and the slalom race. She was the second skier to finish in the Super Combined. She was the third skier to finish in the Super G race and the Giant Slalom Race. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Living people Category:1989 births Category:German skiers Category:Sportspeople from Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg
title: Andrea Rothfuss
